amendment.description: Amendment increases and decreases funding for the National Cancer Institute by $1 million to support a National Cancer Institute study on how to improve communication between cancer care providers, cancer patients, and survivors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease funding for the National Cancer Institute by $1 million to support a National Cancer Institute study on how to improve communication between cancer care providers, cancer patients, and survivors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 381 - 42 (Roll no. 254).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 381 - 42 (Roll no. 254).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
